api.name: azureblob
api.description: Microsoft Azure Storage provides a massively scalable, durable, and highly available storage for data on the cloud, and serves as the data storage solution for modern applications. Connect to Blob Storage to perform various operations such as create, update, get and delete on blobs in your Azure Storage account.

api.name: azureblob
api.description: Microsoft Azure Storage provides a massively scalable, durable, and highly available storage for data on the cloud, and serves as the data storage solution for modern applications. Connect to Blob Storage to perform various operations such as create, update, get and delete on blobs in your Azure Storage account.

api.name: azureeventgrid
api.description: Azure Event Grid is an eventing backplane that enables event based programing with pub/sub semantics and reliable distribution & delivery for all services in Azure as well as third parties.

api.name: azuremonitorlogs
api.description: Use this connector to query your Azure Monitor Logs across Log Analytics workspace and Application Insights component, to list or visualize results.

api.name: documentdb
api.description: Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed multi-model database service designed to enable you to elastically and independently scale throughput and storage across any number of geographical regions with a comprehensive SLA.

api.name: kusto
api.description: Azure Data Explorer a.k.a Kusto is a log analytics cloud platform optimized for ad-hoc big data queries. Read more about it here: http://aka.ms/kdocs

api.name: office365
api.description: Microsoft Office 365 is a cloud-based service that is designed to help meet your organization's needs for robust security, reliability, and user productivity.

api.name: sftpwithssh
api.description: SFTP (SSH File Transfer Protocol) is a network protocol that provides file access, file transfer, and file management over any reliable data stream. It was designed by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) as an extension of the Secure Shell protocol (SSH) version 2.0 to provide secure file transfer capabilities.

api.name: sharepointonline
api.description: SharePoint helps organizations share and collaborate with colleagues, partners, and customers. You can connect to SharePoint Online or to an on-premises SharePoint 2013 or 2016 farm using the On-Premises Data Gateway to manage documents and list items.

api.name: sharepointonline
api.description: SharePoint helps organizations share and collaborate with colleagues, partners, and customers. You can connect to SharePoint Online or to an on-premises SharePoint 2013 or 2016 farm using the On-Premises Data Gateway to manage documents and list items.

ruleDefinitions.Name: digestMailConfiguration
ruleDefinitions.Description: This rule describes the digest mail preferences

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_billingdatavolumedailyspikeextension
ruleDefinitions.DisplayName: Abnormal rise in daily data volume (preview)
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the billing data generated by your application, and can warn you about an unusual increase in your application's billing costs

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_canaryextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: Canary extension

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_exceptionchangeextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the exceptions thrown in your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in your exception telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_memoryleakextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the memory consumption of each process in your application, and can warn you about potential memory leaks or increased memory consumption.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_securityextensionspackage
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the telemetry generated by your application and detects potential security issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_traceseveritydetector
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the trace logs emitted from your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in the severity of your trace telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Description: A configuration that controls the migration state of Smart Detection to Smart Alerts

properties.description: Start/Stop VMs during off-hours : AutoStop azure function has attempted an action

allOf.query:
traces
| where (operation_Name contains "AutoStop")
| where ( message hasprefix "~AutoStop" )
| extend output = substring(message,1)
| summarize by message, output
| project output

properties.description: Start/Stop VMs during off-hours : Scheduled azure function has attempted an action

allOf.query:
traces
| where (operation_Name contains "Scheduled")
| where ( message hasprefix "~Scheduled" )
| extend output = substring(message,1)
| summarize by message, output
| project output

properties.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" 
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and 
  InstanceName !in ("_Total") and InstanceName !contains "HarddiskVolume" and TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend SplitRscId = split(_ResourceId, "/")
| where SplitRscId[(array_length(SplitRscId) - 4)] != "virtualmachinescalesets"
| extend DomainName = Computer
| extend FreeSpaceGB = round((CounterValue / 1000),1)
| extend VMName = tostring(SplitRscId[(array_length(SplitRscId) - 1)])
| where VMName in (split(tolower("{VirtualMachines:name}"), ", "))
| summarize round(min(FreeSpaceGB), 1) by VMName, DomainName, InstanceName //, SVMs
| join kind=inner 
  (Perf
        | where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and
          CounterName == "% Free Space" and
          TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
        | extend DomainName = Computer
        | extend FreePercent = round(CounterValue,1)
        | extend UsedPercent = round((100 - FreePercent),1)
        | summarize min(FreePercent), min(UsedPercent) by DomainName
   ) on DomainName

InsightsMetrics 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "Memory" and Name == "AvailableMB" 
| extend TotalMemory = toreal(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"])
| extend AvailableMemoryPercentage = (toreal(Val) / TotalMemory) * 100.0 
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(AvailableMemoryPercentage) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId

InsightsMetrics
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "Processor" and Name == "UtilizationPercentage" 
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer, _ResourceId
search in (ConfigurationChange) * | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange

search in (ConfigurationChange) ConfigChangeType == "Software" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer | limit 500000 // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange ConfigChangeType=Software | Measure count() by Computer  | top 500000
search in (ConfigurationChange) ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange ConfigChangeType=WindowsServices

properties.displayName: Count of different Software change types
properties.query: search in (ConfigurationChange) ConfigChangeType == "Software" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ChangeCategory // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange ConfigChangeType=Software | measure count() by ChangeCategory
search in (ConfigurationChange) ConfigChangeType == "Software" | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange ConfigChangeType=Software

properties.displayName: List of all Windows Services that have been stopped
properties.query: search in (ConfigurationChange) ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" and SvcState == "Stopped" | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=ConfigurationChange ConfigChangeType=WindowsServices SvcState=Stopped

properties.displayName: All Computers with their most recent data
properties.query:
search not(ObjectName == "Advisor Metrics" or ObjectName == "ManagedSpace") | summarize AggregatedValue = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | limit 500000 | sort by Computer asc
// Oql: NOT(ObjectName="Advisor Metrics" OR ObjectName=ManagedSpace) | measure max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | top 500000 | Sort Computer // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Which Management Group is generating the most data points?
properties.query:
search * | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ManagementGroupName
// Oql: * | Measure count() by ManagementGroupName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search * | extend Type = $table | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Type
// Oql: * | Measure count() by Type // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search not(ObjectName == "Advisor Metrics" or ObjectName == "ManagedSpace") | summarize lastdata = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | limit 500000 | where lastdata < ago(24h)
// Oql: NOT(ObjectName="Advisor Metrics" OR ObjectName=ManagedSpace) | measure max(TimeGenerated) as lastdata by Computer | top 500000 | where lastdata < NOW-24HOURS // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

Event | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

Syslog | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Syslog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: All Syslog Records grouped by Facility
properties.query:
Syslog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Facility
// Oql: Type=Syslog | Measure count() by Facility // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: All Syslog Records grouped by ProcessName
properties.query:
Syslog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ProcessName
// Oql: Type=Syslog | Measure count() by ProcessName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

Syslog | where SeverityLevel == "error" | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Syslog SeverityLevel=error // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Average HTTP Request time by Client IP Address
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(TimeTaken) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Avg(TimeTaken) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(TimeTaken) by csMethod
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Avg(TimeTaken) by csMethod // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by HTTP Request Method
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csMethod
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csMethod // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by HTTP User Agent
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUserAgent

properties.displayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by Host requested by client
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csHost
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csHost // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by URL for the host "www.contoso.com" (replace with your own)
properties.query:
search csHost == "www.contoso.com" | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog csHost="www.contoso.com" | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by URL requested by client (without query strings)
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of Events with level "Warning" grouped by Event ID
properties.query:
Event | where EventLevelName == "warning" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event EventLevelName=warning | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by scStatus
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by scStatus // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of Events grouped by Event Log
properties.query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventLog
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by EventLog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of Events grouped by Event ID
properties.query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of Events grouped by Event Source
properties.query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Source
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by Source // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Events in the Operations Manager Event Log whose Event ID is in the range between 2000 and 3000
properties.query:
Event | where EventLog == "Operations Manager" and EventID >= 2000 and EventID <= 3000 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Operations Manager" EventID:[2000..3000] // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Count of Events containing the word "started" grouped by EventID
properties.query:
search in (Event) "started" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event "started" | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Find the maximum time taken for each page
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = max(TimeTaken) by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Max(TimeTaken) by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: IIS Log Entries for a specific client IP Address (replace with your own)
properties.query:
search cIP == "192.168.0.1" | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | sort by TimeGenerated desc | project csUriStem, scBytes, csBytes, TimeTaken, scStatus
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog cIP="192.168.0.1" | Select csUriStem,scBytes,csBytes,TimeTaken,scStatus // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: How many connections to Operations Manager's SDK service by day
properties.query:
Event | where EventID == 26328 and EventLog == "Operations Manager" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventID=26328 EventLog="Operations Manager" | Measure count() interval 1DAY // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: When did my servers initiate restart?
properties.query:
search in (Event) "shutdown" and EventLog == "System" and Source == "User32" and EventID == 1074 | sort by TimeGenerated desc | project TimeGenerated, Computer
// Oql: shutdown Type=Event EventLog=System Source=User32 EventID=1074 | Select TimeGenerated,Computer // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Shows which pages people are getting a 404 for
properties.query:
search scStatus == 404 | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog scStatus=404 | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Shows servers that are throwing internal server error
properties.query:
search scStatus == 500 | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by sComputerName
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog scStatus=500 | Measure count() by sComputerName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Total Bytes received by each Azure Role Instance
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by RoleInstance
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by RoleInstance // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Total Bytes received by each IIS Computer
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by Computer | limit 500000
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by Computer | top 500000 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Total Bytes responded back to clients by Client IP Address
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(scBytes) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(scBytes) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Total Bytes responded back to clients by each IIS ServerIP Address
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(scBytes) by sIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(scBytes) by sIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Total Bytes sent by Client IP Address
properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

Event | where EventLevelName == "warning" | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLevelName=warning // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Windows Firewall Policy settings have changed
properties.query:
Event | where EventLog == "Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" and EventID == 2008 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" EventID=2008 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: On which machines and how many times have Windows Firewall Policy settings changed
properties.query:
Event | where EventLog == "Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" and EventID == 2008 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer | limit 500000
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" EventID=2008 | measure count() by Computer | top 500000 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122

properties.displayName: Accounts who terminated Microsoft antimalware ("MsMpEng.exe") on any computer
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4689 and "MsMpEng.exe" | summarize TerminationCount = count() by Account
search in (SecurityEvent) * | project TimeGenerated, Account, Activity, Computer | sort by TimeGenerated desc

properties.displayName: Computers where "hash.exe" was executed (replace with different process name) more than 5 times
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4688 and "hash.exe" | summarize ExecutionCount = count() by Computer | limit 500000 | where ExecutionCount > 5

properties.displayName: Computers where the Microsoft antimalware process ("MsMpEng.exe") was terminated
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4689 and "MsMpEng.exe" | summarize TerminationCount = count() by Computer | limit 500000

properties.displayName: Computers whose security log was cleared
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 1102 | summarize LogClearedCount = count() by Computer | limit 500000
search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 | summarize LogonCount = count() by Account
search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 | summarize LogonCount = count() by Computer | limit 500000

properties.displayName: Logon Activity by Computer Where More than 10 logons have happened
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 | summarize LogonCount = count() by Computer | limit 500000 | where LogonCount > 10

properties.displayName: Logon Activity by Account for accounts who only logged on less than 5 times
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 | summarize LogonCount = count() by Account | where LogonCount < 5

properties.displayName: All Process names that were executed
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4688 | summarize ExecutionCount = count() by NewProcessName

properties.displayName: Accounts who remotely logged on the computer "Computer01.contoso.com" (replace with your own computer name)
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 and (LogonTypeName == "3 - Network" or LogonTypeName == "10 - RemoteInteractive") and Computer == "Computer01.contoso.com" | summarize RemoteLogonCount = count() by Account

properties.displayName: Security Activities on the computer "Computer01.contoso.com" (replace with your own computer name)
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) Computer == "COMPUTER01.contoso.com" | project TimeGenerated, Account, Activity, Computer | sort by TimeGenerated desc

properties.displayName: Security Activities on the computer "COMPUTER01.contoso.com" for account "Administrator" (replace with your own computer and account names)
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) Computer == "COMPUTER01.contoso.com" and TargetUserName == "Administrator" | project TimeGenerated, Account, Activity, Computer | sort by TimeGenerated desc
Update | where UpdateState == 'Needed' and Optional == false and Classification == 'Security Updates' and Approved != false | summarize count() by Computer
ProtectionStatus | summarize (TimeGenerated, ThreatStatusRank) = argmax(TimeGenerated, ThreatStatusRank) by Computer | where ThreatStatusRank > 199 and ThreatStatusRank != 470
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4624 and TargetUserName == 'Guest' and LogonType in (10, 3) | summarize count() by Computer

union isfuzzy=true (WireData | where Direction == 'Outbound'), (WindowsFirewall | where CommunicationDirection == 'SEND'), (CommonSecurityLog | where CommunicationDirection == 'Outbound') | where isnotempty(MaliciousIP) | summarize by MaliciousIP

properties.displayName: High priority Active Directory assessment security recommendations
properties.query: let schemaColumns = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime, RecommendationId:string)[]; union isfuzzy=true schemaColumns, (ADAssessmentRecommendation | where FocusArea == 'Security and Compliance' and RecommendationResult == 'Failed' and RecommendationScore>=35) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId

properties.displayName: High priority SQL assessment security recommendations
properties.query: let schemaColumns = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime, RecommendationId:string)[]; union isfuzzy=true schemaColumns, (SQLAssessmentRecommendation | where FocusArea == 'Security and Compliance' and RecommendationResult == 'Failed' and RecommendationScore>=35) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4625 | summarize count() by TargetAccount
LinuxAuditLog | where RecordType == 'user_login' and res != 'success' | summarize count() by acct
LinuxAuditLog | where RecordType == 'syscall' and syscall == 'execve' | summarize count() by cmd

properties.displayName: Loading or Unloading of Kernel modules (Linux)
properties.query: LinuxAuditLog | where key == 'kernelmodules' and RecordType != 'CONFIG_CHANGE'
LinuxAuditLog | where RecordType == 'syscall' and syscall == 'execve' | summarize count() by exe
SecurityEvent | where EventID in (4723, 4724) | summarize count() by TargetAccount
SecurityEvent | where EventID in (1102, 517) and EventSourceName == 'Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog' | summarize count() by Computer

properties.displayName: Computers with failed Linux user password change
properties.query: Syslog | where Facility == 'authpriv' and ((SyslogMessage has 'passwd:chauthtok' and SyslogMessage has 'authentication failure') or SyslogMessage has 'password change failed') | summarize count() by Computer

Syslog | where (Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'sshd:auth' and SyslogMessage has 'authentication failure') or (Facility == 'auth' and ((SyslogMessage has 'Failed' and SyslogMessage has 'invalid user' and SyslogMessage has 'ssh2') or SyslogMessage has 'error: PAM: Authentication failure')) | summarize count() by Computer

Syslog | where (Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'sudo:auth' and (SyslogMessage has 'authentication failure' or SyslogMessage has 'conversation failed')) or ((Facility == 'auth' or Facility == 'authpriv') and SyslogMessage has 'user NOT in sudoers') | summarize count() by Computer

Syslog | where (Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'su:auth' and SyslogMessage has 'authentication failure') or (Facility == 'auth' and SyslogMessage has 'FAILED SU') | summarize count() by Computer

properties.displayName: Computers with new Linux group created
properties.query: Syslog | where Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'new group' | summarize count() by Computer

properties.displayName: Computers with users added to a Linux group
properties.query: Syslog | where Facility == 'authpriv' and SyslogMessage has 'to group' and (SyslogMessage has 'add' or SyslogMessage has 'added') | summarize by Computer
let schemaColumns = datatable(ClientIP:string)[]; union isfuzzy=true schemaColumns, (DnsEvents | where SubType == 'LookupQuery' and isnotempty(MaliciousIP)) | summarize count() by ClientIP
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4740 | summarize count() by TargetAccount
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 5712 | summarize count() by Computer
SecurityEvent | where EventID in (4727, 4731, 4735, 4737, 4754, 4755) | summarize count() by TargetAccount
SecurityEvent | where EventID in (4720, 4722) | summarize by TargetAccount
Update | where UpdateState == 'Needed' and Optional == false and Classification == 'Critical Updates' and Approved != false | summarize count() by Computer
ProtectionStatus | summarize (TimeGenerated, ProtectionStatusRank) = argmax(TimeGenerated, ProtectionStatusRank) by Computer | where ProtectionStatusRank > 199 and ProtectionStatusRank != 550

properties.displayName: Computers with system audit policy changes
properties.query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4719 | summarize count() by Computer
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4739 | summarize count() by DomainPolicyChanged

properties.displayName: Logons with a clear text password
properties.query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4624 and LogonType == 8 | summarize count() by TargetAccount

properties.displayName: Low priority AD assessment security recommendations
properties.query: let schemaColumns = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime, RecommendationId:string)[]; union isfuzzy=true schemaColumns, (ADAssessmentRecommendation | where FocusArea == 'Security and Compliance' and RecommendationResult == 'Failed' and RecommendationScore<35) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId

properties.displayName: Low priority SQL assessment security recommendations
properties.query: let schemaColumns = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime, RecommendationId:string)[]; union isfuzzy=true schemaColumns, (SQLAssessmentRecommendation | where FocusArea == 'Security and Compliance' and RecommendationResult == 'Failed' and RecommendationScore<35) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId
SecurityEvent | where EventID in (4728, 4732, 4756) | summarize count() by SubjectAccount
SecurityEvent | where EventID == 8002 and Fqbn == '-' | summarize ExecutionCountHash=count() by FileHash | where ExecutionCountHash <= 5
search in (UpdateSummary) * | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by WindowsUpdateSetting // Oql: Type=UpdateSummary | measure count() by WindowsUpdateSetting
search in (UpdateSummary) WindowsUpdateSetting == "Manual" | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=UpdateSummary WindowsUpdateSetting=Manual

search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" | project Computer, Title, KBID, Classification, UpdateSeverity, PublishedDate | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux UpdateState=Needed Optional=false | select Computer,Title,KBID,Classification,UpdateSeverity,PublishedDate

properties.displayName: Distinct missing updates across all computers
properties.query: search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" | distinct Title // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux UpdateState=Needed Optional=false | Distinct Title

properties.displayName: Error events for machines that have missing critical or security required updates
properties.query: search in (Event) EventLevelName == "error" and Computer in ((search in (Update) (Classification == "Security Updates" or Classification == "Critical Updates") and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" | distinct Computer)) | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=Event EventLevelName=error Computer IN {Type=Update (Classification="Security Updates" OR Classification="Critical Updates") UpdateState=Needed Optional=false | Distinct Computer}

properties.displayName: All computers with missing critical or security updates
properties.query: search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" and (Classification == "Security Updates" or Classification == "Critical Updates") | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux UpdateState=Needed Optional=false (Classification="Security Updates" OR Classification="Critical Updates")

properties.displayName: Missing updates for computer "COMPUTER01.contoso.com" (replace with your own computer name)
properties.query: search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" and Computer == "COMPUTER01.contoso.com" | project Computer, Title, KBID, Product, UpdateSeverity, PublishedDate | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux UpdateState=Needed Optional=false Computer="COMPUTER01.contoso.com" | select Computer,Title,KBID,Product,UpdateSeverity,PublishedDate

properties.displayName: Critical or security updates needed by machines where updates are manually applied
properties.query: search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and UpdateState == "Needed" and Optional == "false" and (Classification == "Security Updates" or Classification == "Critical Updates") and Computer in ((search in (UpdateSummary) WindowsUpdateSetting == "Manual" | distinct Computer)) | distinct KBID // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux UpdateState=Needed Optional=false (Classification="Security Updates" OR Classification="Critical Updates") Computer IN {Type=UpdateSummary WindowsUpdateSetting=Manual | Distinct Computer} | Distinct KBID

properties.displayName: All computers with missing update rollups
properties.query: search in (Update) OSType != "Linux" and Optional == "false" and Classification == "Update Rollups" and UpdateState == "Needed" | project Computer, Title, KBID, Classification, UpdateSeverity, PublishedDate | sort by TimeGenerated desc // Oql: Type=Update OSType!=Linux Optional=false Classification="Update Rollups" UpdateState=Needed | select Computer,Title,KBID,Classification,UpdateSeverity,PublishedDate
search in (UpdateSummary) * | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by WSUSServer // Oql: Type=UpdateSummary | measure count() by WSUSServer
